trends: There have been 158 other sightings in Portland
There were no other sightings in Portland on or around September 24th 2009
divs: Sighting Detailswas walking out of work at university of portland about 3 0r 4 after the hour when I heard a jet roar but I didnt see a jet I saw two triangles one was following the other.the second was trying to keep up with the other one and was going fast then suddendly slowed down.the lights were plusating slowly.then I noticed no planes in the area then about 25 after the hour a plane flew by then 60 seconds later a white light appeared to be heading the same direction as the two triangles 1.I was at the university of portland and was heading home 2.I heard a jet roar but no jet was there. 3.I was sure what it was then I saw the shapes of triangels 4.they were both triangles one was being chased by the other.the second was catching up to the frist one and was able to then slowed down in seconds.. 5.I was excited and stunned I just stood there watching.I thought it was really cool. 6.it flew behind some buildings out of sight.
Summary: two triangles two red lights on the bottom on red on top on each triangle
